Post-Match Reflections: The match marked Olivier Giroud’s last home game for France, as he is retiring from the French national team after Euro 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kylian Mbappé played only about 20 minutes as France drew 0-0 with Canada in its final warmup.
Others: Olivier Giroud is moving to Los Angeles FC in Major League Soccer after retiring from the French national team.
